**Human Resources Professional Services Omnibus Tender Announcement**
================================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-8035-77637617, Amendment Number: 4
**Solicitation Number:** 20230714
**Publication Date:** August 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 29, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Project Overview:**
oser (Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions) has announced a tender for Human Resources Professional Services (HPRS) to support the Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO) mandate. This project aims to provide specialized HR resources to supplement and augment oser's HR staff on a temporary and on-demand basis.

**Description of Work:**
The selected contractor will provide a range of HPRS to encompass organization design and classification, employee relations, compensation, HR information systems, leadership development, staffing, and HR policy development.

**Eligible Suppliers:**
The tender is open to those registered under Tier 1, Supply Arrangement Holders (SA Holders) who are qualified for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) under Stream 1. The following 15 SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp. and Randstad Interim Inc
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc
* ATEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC
* BDO Canada LLP
* Calian Ltd.
* Cofomo Inc
* Contract Community Inc
* Elevated Thinking Inc
* Excel Human Resources Inc
* HDP Group Inc
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGYCORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Prompta Inc
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc

**Security Requirements:**
The contract requires minimum corporate security of Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and minimum resource security of Reliability status.

**Tender Process:**
Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified SA Holders. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries, please contact the Contracting Authority:

* Name: Craig Kenny
* Email: contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 550-0408

**Important Notes:**
* This tender is subject to the Task and Solutions
